entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few showers beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 19. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Showers beginning before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
